frontmatter.title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
frontmatter.description: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck: A Counterintuitive Approach to Living a Good Life is the FCC first book by blogger and author Mark Manson. In it Manson argues that life's struggles give it meaning, and that the mindless positivity of typical self-help books is neither practical nor helpful. It was a bestseller.
